title: Workplace Change Experiences and Learning: Narrative-Based Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational structures and scientific problem-solving methods
context.additional_context: Learners assume the role of office workers (administrative/managerial) and operate in a limited technological environment (primarily smartphones). Reflective practice based on real-world cases and collaboration are emphasized.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze planned/unplanned workplace change cases in narrative format and explain interactions between affect (emotions) and materiality (physical environment) during change processes
Learners can submit project deliverables evaluating the sustained effects of change experiences using organizational documents and physical evidence
Learners can investigate organizational restructuring cases triggered by unpredictable events (e.g., fires) and propose learning/innovation strategies in crisis situations

resources: Smartphone-compatible collaboration tools (Google Docs, Naver Band, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
